mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username = #{username} and state = 0;
select * from sys_user where email = #{email} and state = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (dept_id, username, nick_name, gender, phone, email, password, is_admin, enabled, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{deptId}, #{username}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{password}, #{isAdmin}, #{enabled}, current_timestamp , current_timestamp)
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET password = #{password} WHERE username = #{username} and state = 0
UPDATE sys_user SET email = #{email} WHERE username = #{username} and state = 0
UPDATE sys_user SET state = 1 WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND state = 0
